level.text: Miscellaneous Overlay Districts are created to implement the Comprehensive Plan and other public policy goals and objectives.

The Miscellaneous Overlay Districts include, but are not limited to, those overlay districts that are applied to a specific small area or neighborhood that requires special treatment in controlling land uses.
The Miscellaneous Overlay Districts may provide development incentives, restrictions, or a combination thereof.

level.heading: AUTHORITY
level.text: Unless otherwise noted, the authority for this chapter is the Zoning Act of 1938, approved June 20, 1938 (52 Stat. 797, as amended; D.C. Official Code §§ 6-641.01 to 6-641.15 (2001)(formerly codified at D.C. Code §§ 5-413 to 5-432 (1994 Repl. & 1999 Supp.))).
